titleStmt.title: Methodus Evangelica, or, The gospel method of Gods saving sinners by Jesus Christ practically explained in XII propositions / by Abraham Clifford ; to which is prefixed a preface by Dr. Manton, and Rich. Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Clifford, Abraham.
Manton, Thomas, 1620-1677.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Brabazon Aylmer,

notesStmt.note: Running title: A discourse of the new covenant.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
